summary: This document is an email chain from May 24, 2021, in which attorney Jason Foy forwards a threatening email received by his partner, James Seplowitz, to a government contact (Eric Sarraga). Foy interprets the email as a threat against his safety, believes it is related to a client, and requests a government investigation into its credibility.

persons.name: Jason Foy
persons.context: Attorney at Foy & Seplowitz LLC who forwards a threatening email received by his partner to a government contact, requesting an investigation as he perceives it as a threat to his safety.

persons.name: James Seplowitz
persons.context: Partner at Foy & Seplowitz LLC who received a threatening email, which he then forwarded to Jason Foy and Eric Sarraga.

persons.name: Eric Sarraga
persons.context: Government recipient (likely at US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York - USANYS) copied on the email chain regarding the threat investigation request.

persons.name: Vegas Army Vet
persons.context: The alias of the individual who sent the threatening email to James Seplowitz, with the message 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!'

connections.description: Partners at the law firm Foy & Seplowitz LLC, as indicated by the email signature and reference to 'my partner'.
Foy is communicating with Sarraga, a government contact, to request an investigation into a perceived threat.
Seplowitz received a threatening email from the alias 'Vegas Army Vet'.
Foy interprets the email sent to his partner as a threat against his own safety, implying he or his client is the intended target.

events.title: Threatening Email Received
events.description: Attorney James Seplowitz receives an email from 'Vegas Army Vet' containing the message 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!', which Jason Foy interprets as a threat.

events.title: Request for Government Investigation
events.description: Jason Foy forwards the threatening email to government contact Eric Sarraga, formally requesting an expedited investigation into the credibility of the threat.

keyFacts: Attorney Jason Foy received a forwarded threatening email sent to his partner, James Seplowitz, on May 24, 2021.
The threatening email, from 'Vegas Army Vet', stated: 'Go ahead let your client know, THIS ISN'T OVER!!'
Foy interpreted the email as a direct threat against his personal safety and believed it was related to a client.
Foy formally requested the government (via Eric Sarraga) to investigate the threat's credibility using its resources.
